text: Mavi may refer to: ==Places== *Mavi, East Azerbaijan, a village in East Azerbaijan Province, Iran *Mavi, Razavi Khorasan, a village in Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran *Mavi, Hamadan, a village in Hamadan Province, Iran *Mavi-ye Olya, a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran *Mavi-ye Sofla, a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran *Shahrak-e Mavi, a village in Khuzestan Province, Iran ==Other uses== * Maví or Maybe, a tree bark-based beverage * Mavi (jeans), a Turkish clothing company ("Mavi" meaning "blue" in Turkish) * A Jatt clan in the Punjab region of India and Pakistan; see Nayagaon, Punjab
title: Mavi
